mapper.select:
select distinct a.REP_ROUT_ID, a.ROUT_ID, a.DAY_DIV, b.REP_ROUT_NM, c.ROUT_NM, c.SHAPE_DIV
from BRT_OPER_PL_ROUT_INFO a INNER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST b on a.REP_ROUT_ID = b.REP_ROUT_ID INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST c on a.ROUT_ID = c.ROUTE_ID order by b.REP_ROUT_NM, a.DAY_DIV

select a.REP_ROUT_ID, a.ROUT_ID, a.DAY_DIV, a.ALLOC_NO, c.ROUT_NM, a.OPER_SN, a.COR_ID, a.REST_TIME, a.ROUT_SN, b.REP_ROUT_NM, c.WAY_DIV
from BRT_OPER_ALLOC_PL_ROUT_INFO a INNER JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST b on a.REP_ROUT_ID = b.REP_ROUT_ID INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST c on a.ROUT_ID = c.ROUTE_ID where a.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} and a.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV}

select COR_ID REP_ROUT_ID COR_NM
from BRT_COR_MST on a.REP_ROUT_ID = b.REP_ROUT_ID INNER JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST c on a.ROUT_ID = c.ROUTE_ID where a.REP_ROUT_ID = #{REP_ROUT_ID} and a.DAY_DIV = #{DAY_DIV}
